jchess.ruleengine

Class ExtendedRuleEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.ruleengine.DefaultRuleEngine
      • jchess.ruleengine.ExtendedRuleEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRuleEngine

    public class ExtendedRuleEngine
extends DefaultRuleEngine
    This class provides functionality to process extended (custom) rules. It evaluates the possible move candidates using the Rules acceptable in XML. It also facilitate in executing the Rules.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim

    • Method Detail

      • tryEvaluateAllRules

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IMoveCandidate> tryEvaluateAllRules(IBoardAgent oBoard,
                                                                          IPieceAgent oPiece)
        This method is an extension to one defined in DefaultRuleEngine. It entertains custom Rules and adds further move candidates in addition to those that DefaultRuleEngine provides.
        Specified by:
        tryEvaluateAllRules in interface IRuleEngine
        Overrides:
        tryEvaluateAllRules in class DefaultRuleEngine

      • tryExecuteRule

        public IBoardActivity tryExecuteRule(IBoardAgent oBoard,
                                     IMoveCandidate oMoveCandidate)
        This method executes custom (user defined) rules.
